name: Running in the 80's - GGJ2023
description:
An infinite runner arcade game. As you zoom through the world of video games as an NES controller, you must avoid the future as you dodge obstacles from the powerful new technology era.

Credits: 

3D Assets, VFX & Lighting - Matthew Nixon (https://www.artstation.com/matthewnixonart/profile)
Programming & Design - Fiona Beattie (https://fionabeattie182.wixsite.com/portfolio)
UI - Dylan Clemenson (https://www.linkedin.com/in/dylan-clemenson-b0b966236/)

Music by EvgenyBardyuzha and AlexiAction
